Â« Older Entries Next Entries Â» GOLF TIP Last month I shared a tip from Manuel de la Tore. As I related, he emphasized swinging the golf club with control and balance. So this month, let me add two more of his instructional pointers: 1.	For Manuel, all good golf swings begin with a grip where the two hands face each other as they wrap around the handle of the golf club. As you wrap your hands around the club, be sure to grip without choking the life out of it. Remember, the golf club is your friend, not your enemy. 2.	All good golf swings incorporate a balance between a relaxed and athletic stance, with slightly flexed knees and arms that hang without tension. From this setup, golfers can generate a smooth swing with a consistent tempo. Hopefully, these tips help you the next time you tee it up. TUESDAY NIGHT SCRAMBLE Last week we finished our fourth month of Tuesday Night Scrambles. Between 12 and 18, four-man teams have competed for weekly cash prizes and skins. Tuesday, July 20th, 72 players came ready to play for a $360 cash purse and a skin package worth $1600. With that said, the team of Dave Mack, Justin Knapp, Danny Hamilton, and Joe Porfidio eagled hole number 9 for the â€œloneâ€ skin. Congratulations, guys! MENâ€™S GOLF ASSOCIATION July has been a big month for the Menâ€™s Golf Association, as our MGA has grown to 43 men, and we held two tournaments. On Saturday, July 10th, twenty-eight men signed up to play the two-man best ball, and on Saturday, July 24th fifteen men played in an individual stroke play tournament. Everyone played for cash prizes and a year-end cash payout based on individual points accumulated from each event. Julyâ€™s winners are listed below, and the current point standings of the top five golfers. Two-Man Best Ball Winners: 1st Place: Jon Love and Dave Mack (64) â€“ $40 each 2nd Place: Gary Hoagland and Rannel Westberry (65) â€“ $30 each 3rd Place: Tommy Lambert and Danny Hamilton (65) â€“ $20 each 4th Place: Al Herndon and Walter Diggs (66) â€“ $15 each Individual Stroke Play Winners: 1st Place: Jon Love (73) â€“ $30 2nd Place: Buddy Brown (73) â€“ $25 3rd Place: James Tripp (73) â€“ $20 YTD Point Standings: Jon Love 52; Dave Mack 47; Rannel Westberry 44; Buddy Brown 44; Gary Hoagland 43; Tommy Lambert 41; James Tripp 41; Bill Nisely 40; Al Herndon 47; Scott Collins 31

Golf Course & Info - Magnolia Point Golf Club EMAIL: GOLF@MAGNOLIAPOINTGOLFCLUB.COM PHONE: 904-269-9276 Home About Us About Our Club Calendar Our Staff BLOG CLUB & AMENITIES POOL The Pub Lunch Menu Dinner Menu Brunch Menu Media Golf Make A Tee Time Golf Course Info Plan A Golf Tournament Upcoming Events Scorecard Media Tennis Tennis Programs and Information Tennis Reservations Media WEDDINGS Weddings & Special Events 2025 WEDDING PACKET MEMBERSHIP Resident Membership Non-Resident Membership Member Portal Internet Member Specials Contact Us SEE OUR TUESDAY NIGHT SEASONAL SCRAMBLE VIDEO Golf Course â€˜Floridaâ€™s Hidden Golf Get-Awayâ€™ Located in Green Cove Springs, Florida, Magnolia Point Golf Course is 18 holes of championship-style golf. Designed by Mark McCumber, measuring 6,796 yards, this par 72 golf course will challenge even the most experienced players as they navigate the drastic elevation changes, sharp dog legs, water hazards and thick rough. All 18 holes are carved out of Floridaâ€™s wooded wetlands, offering scenic views with tree-lined fairways while weaving through the beautiful Magnolia Point community. Rates We invite you out to play our course weekdays or weekends. Rates will vary based on day and time so please click on the link below to book a tee time. MAKE A TEE TIME Memberships Thank you for your interest in becoming a member at Magnolia Point Golf & Country Club! Our memberships encompass all types of players from the every-day player to the weekend warrior, we have a plan that will match your budget. Memberships offer many benefits including breaks on merchandise and certain F&B items. There are several types of memberships available and welcome any questions you may have. For additional information about pricing, contact us at 904-269-9276. We look forward to hearing from you! Instruction We want to help you become the golfer you want to be! Our staff can work with you on the range, on the course, or discuss strategies with you â€“ we are here to help. Adult Lessons: 30 Min â€“ $40 1 Hour â€“ $80 Junior Lessons (16 & Under): 30 Min â€“ $30 1 Hour â€“ $60 Contact the Pro Shop at 904-269-9276 to schedule your lesson today! The Red Nine - Magnolia Point Golf Club EMAIL: GOLF@MAGNOLIAPOINTGOLFCLUB.COM PHONE: 904-269-9276 Home About Us About Our Club Calendar Our Staff BLOG CLUB & AMENITIES POOL The Pub Lunch Menu Dinner Menu Brunch Menu Media Golf Make A Tee Time Golf Course Info Plan A Golf Tournament Upcoming Events Scorecard Media Tennis Tennis Programs and Information Tennis Reservations Media WEDDINGS Weddings & Special Events 2025 WEDDING PACKET MEMBERSHIP Resident Membership Non-Resident Membership Member Portal Internet Member Specials Contact Us The Red Nine by Deneen Barrett-Rothfels | Aug 22, 2017 | Club News | 0 comments To the Members of the MPGCC Community, There has been considerable talk and many inquiries regarding the status Red Nine on the golf course.Â  After much deliberation and consultation with professionals, we have concluded that the Red Nine is not viable in todayâ€™s golfing market and that we must seek reasonable alternative uses for the subject property to maintain the business and financial health of MPGCC. It is important to note that the Red Nine property, measuring over 100 acres in area, was closed in a short period of time after it was established because it was not profitable. It is an unproductive property that stalls the future improvement and upgrade of the operating golf club.Â  Consequently, we must always be looking for ways to improve the business and financial position of the Club.Â  At present, we are spending over $40,000 per year in mowing fees, insurance, and taxes to maintain a property that generates no profits.Â  This is an untenable business position. The Red Nine property has generated great interest among residential as well as commercial developers over the past several years.Â  We have received numerous unsolicited offers to purchase this property for development for a variety of options. All of these offers have been rejected outright because the developerâ€™s proposals to construct crowded houses, undersized lots or other options would incur significant impacts on the fabric of the community. A builder recently expressed interest in building houses on certain portions of the Red Nine, and there are exploratory discussions underway.Â  The builder has developed a preliminary plan with views of house locations and associated lot/house sizes to determine the economic viability of the proposal.Â  The City informed the builder that the Magnolia Point PUD and zoning must be changed. These changes require Council action as well as HOA and Community involvement. We are not under any contractual obligation with any and all options but have been in communication with the HOA board. With no tangible or concrete proposal, all speculations and conversations are premature. We are well aware of the communityâ€™s impact and are absolute in our resolve to find a solution with complete transparency to any development. We are dedicated to preserving the financial health and viability of the community while ensuring that new development incurs no adverse effects.Â  We look forward to sharing more detailed information as it moves from an indeterminate position and enlisting your participation as we move forward. Thank you, Deneen and Trevor Rothfels Owners of Magnolia Point Golf and Country Club

Pool Rules and Regulations - Magnolia Point Golf Club EMAIL: GOLF@MAGNOLIAPOINTGOLFCLUB.COM PHONE: 904-269-9276 Home About Us About Our Club Calendar Our Staff BLOG CLUB & AMENITIES POOL The Pub Lunch Menu Dinner Menu Brunch Menu Media Golf Make A Tee Time Golf Course Info Plan A Golf Tournament Upcoming Events Scorecard Media Tennis Tennis Programs and Information Tennis Reservations Media WEDDINGS Weddings & Special Events 2025 WEDDING PACKET MEMBERSHIP Resident Membership Non-Resident Membership Member Portal Internet Member Specials Contact Us Pool Rules and Regulations by Deneen Barrett-Rothfels | May 26, 2018 | Club News | 0 comments Magnolia Point Golf and Country Club will not utilize social media to address concerns. We will utilize such platforms to promote and bring awareness to club activities for our clienteleâ€™s convenience. If ever a question arises, the club will be happy to address any personâ€™s concern with a meeting or phone call. If you choose to call a manager at the club, please leave a message and allow a reasonable amount of time for a response. The clubâ€™s owners also participate in most HOA meetings and resident orientations to address any concerns about the club in an open forum.Â Â These pool rules and requirements are for our membershipâ€™s protection and continued enjoyment.Â Thank you for your support. Pool Rules and Regulations Members and Guest swim at your own risk. All Members and Guest must have I.D. & check in at the Clubhouse. Out-of-town/ overnight guests are exempt from guests fees. Members must accompany their guests and must pay a guest fee of $5 for their outside guests using the pool, sunbathing or babysitting in the pool area. Children 13 years and under must be accompanied by an adult. Members and their guests must shower before entering the pool. Swim diapers are required. No child will be permitted with disposable diapers. Appropriate swim-ware is required in the pool area. Proper cover-ups and foot-ware required when entering the Clubhouse. NO running or HORSEPLAY at any time. No Pets No Smoking No Gum No Diving No Glass containers No Playing on the rope/lane lines No Abusive language or improper conduct No outside Food, Beverage & Coolers will be permitted on Magnolia Point Club property. Poolside service is available during The Pubâ€™s hours. Members and their guests are responsible for properly disposing of trash around the pool area. Club management may close the pool for maintenance and or private events. Anyone abusing the pool facilities, equipment, or rules will be subject to disciplinary actions, up to and including revocation of pool privileges, and restitution of monetary damages. The pool and surrounding area is continually monitored by the Pro Shop and The Pub Staff Contact Numbers The Pub: 904-269-9276 ext. 0 Pro Shop: 904-269-9276 ext.1

Pub Menu and Hours of Operation - Magnolia Point Golf Club EMAIL: GOLF@MAGNOLIAPOINTGOLFCLUB.COM PHONE: 904-269-9276 Home About Us About Our Club Calendar Our Staff BLOG CLUB & AMENITIES POOL The Pub Lunch Menu Dinner Menu Brunch Menu Media Golf Make A Tee Time Golf Course Info Plan A Golf Tournament Upcoming Events Scorecard Media Tennis Tennis Programs and Information Tennis Reservations Media WEDDINGS Weddings & Special Events 2025 WEDDING PACKET MEMBERSHIP Resident Membership Non-Resident Membership Member Portal Internet Member Specials Contact Us The Pub The Pub at MP offers excellent food and beverage in the clubhouse restaurant Our menu offers a wide range of delicious items that has something for everyone. Our clubhouse dining is run by our Executive Chef, Joe Cummings, along with his culinary team that is sure to delight your palate. We change our menu seasonally and run a â€œfrom scratch kitchenâ€. From our dressings to our entrees, you can be sure everything is fresh. Come out and join us! ! Magnolia Point Golf and Country Club is proud to present The Pub. After a complete reconstruction and expansion, The Pub is ready to serve as a wonderful location for all of our customers to enjoy. The fun, casual and invitingÂ atmosphere makes it the ideal spot to relax with friends. We are open 11AM to 8PM Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, and Sunday. With the Pub open till 11PM on Friday nights and 9PM on Saturdays. We serve happy hour from 4PM to 6PM (weekdays only) in the Pub. We also have added a full brunch menu on Saturday & Sunday mornings from 9AM to 1PM to expand your dining experience. The Pub now has eight, large flat-screen TVâ€™s for watching your favorite sporting event. Football season is in high gear and we have every game on our new TVâ€™s. In addition to all of the Saturday college games, we also have DirecTVâ€™s NFLÂ  Â Sunday Ticket that has every game! Come cheer on your favorite team! We are offering some great game-day specials to add to the fun. In addition to the new TVâ€™s, we now have a new sound system that will be playing your favorite music all day long. Speaking of music, our Friday Night Live Music will continue with an entertaining rotation of musical performers every Friday night beginning at 6:30 PM. Check our calendar of events and watch your email for all of the latest happenings! We appreciate your continued support and look forward to seeing you soon! SLIDE 4 COMPETITIVE TENNIS LEAGUES AND INSTRUCTION SLIDE 3 A TRUE GOLFER'S PARADISE Welcome to Magnolia Point Golf & Country Clubâ€¦your paradise awaitsâ€¦ Magnolia Point Golf and Country Club is located off U.S. Highway 17, South of Jacksonville, in Green Cove Springs. We are the most prestigious public golf course and country club in Jacksonville, FL. Golfers and tennis players can take advantage of the beautiful Jacksonville scenery, executive amenities open to the public, and first-class facilities. Magnolia Point is the most beautiful Jacksonville golf and country club, with no parallel fairways. Golfers will enjoy a tranquil and scenic view of the 1000-acre community that is abundant with wildlife. Planning an Event at Our Green Cove Springs Catering Hall EMAIL: GOLF@MAGNOLIAPOINTGOLFCLUB.COM PHONE: 904-269-9276 Home About Us About Our Club Calendar Our Staff BLOG CLUB & AMENITIES POOL The Pub Lunch Menu Dinner Menu Brunch Menu Media Golf Make A Tee Time Golf Course Info Plan A Golf Tournament Upcoming Events Scorecard Media Tennis Tennis Programs and Information Tennis Reservations Media WEDDINGS Weddings & Special Events 2025 WEDDING PACKET MEMBERSHIP Resident Membership Non-Resident Membership Member Portal Internet Member Specials Contact Us Our Wedding Venue Magnolia Point Golf and Country Club is a country club wedding venue located in Green Cove Springs, Florida. Located only minutes from Orange Park and Jacksonville, this beautiful event venue offers scenic views of their famous golf course along with both outdoor and indoor event spaces for couples to create the ceremony and reception theyâ€™ve always envisioned on their beautiful grounds. Facilities and Capacity Magnolia Point Golf and Country Club is a spacious wedding and event venue with various event spaces for wedding ceremonies, receptions, anniversary parties, and more. Their event spaces accommodate up to 135 guests and comfortably host small and intimate events and large and extravagant celebrations. The venue offers three event spaces to choose from, both indoor and outdoor. Clients can enjoy an unforgettable wedding ceremony underneath a pergola draped in chiffon, located in their breathtaking gardens, with lush foliage and relaxing fountains and waterfalls. This venue offers the perfect natural setting for your wedding photos, and clients can take advantage of the venueâ€™s beautifully manicured grounds to set a beautiful backdrop for your images. Clients can also enjoy using Magnoliaâ€™s Crystal dining room, where less is more. Couples can enjoy making memories of the picturesque views, inviting atmosphere, and charming getaway at this semi-private country club. If youâ€™d like a more casual setting, The Pub is a great alternative ~ a modern gastro-pub feel with copper top bars, exposed brick pillars edged out with metal and raw concrete floors, your modern event awaits. Facilities and Capacity Magnolia Point Golf and Country Club is a spacious wedding and event venue with various event spaces for wedding ceremonies, receptions, anniversary parties, and more. Their event spaces accommodate up to 135 guests and comfortably host small and intimate events and large and extravagant celebrations. The venue offers three event spaces to choose from, both indoor and outdoor. Clients can enjoy an unforgettable wedding ceremony underneath a pergola draped in chiffon, located in their breathtaking gardens, with lush foliage and relaxing fountains and waterfalls. This venue offers the perfect natural setting for your wedding photos, and clients can take advantage of the venueâ€™s beautifully manicured grounds to set a beautiful backdrop for your images. Clients can also enjoy using Magnoliaâ€™s Crystal dining room, where less is more. Couples can enjoy making memories of the picturesque views, inviting atmosphere, and charming getaway at this semi-private country club. If youâ€™d like a more casual setting, The Pub is a great alternative ~ a modern gastro-pub feel with copper top bars, exposed brick pillars edged out with metal and raw concrete floors, your modern event awaits. Services Offered Magnolia Point Golf and Country Club is a full-service wedding and event venue. The staff offers custom wedding packages for clients to choose the services that align with their wedding vision. They will ensure that each detail of your wedding day is to your liking, with event items for outdoor ceremonies such as chairs, tables, a pergola, and a paver walkway with a stage. In addition, an on-site wedding coordinator will work with you to select the details of your wedding celebration, such as menu choices, bar services, and other wedding details. About our Tennis Club Facilities | Magnolia Tennis Club EMAIL: GOLF@MAGNOLIAPOINTGOLFCLUB.COM PHONE: 904-269-9276 Home About Us About Our Club Calendar Our Staff BLOG CLUB & AMENITIES POOL The Pub Lunch Menu Dinner Menu Brunch Menu Media Golf Make A Tee Time Golf Course Info Plan A Golf Tournament Upcoming Events Scorecard Media Tennis Tennis Programs and Information Tennis Reservations Media WEDDINGS Weddings & Special Events 2025 WEDDING PACKET MEMBERSHIP Resident Membership Non-Resident Membership Member Portal Internet Member Specials Contact Us SEE OUR FRENCH OPEN VIDEO SEE OUR WIMBLEDON VIDEO SEE OUR CAMPS VIDEO SEE OUR MAGNOLIA POINT TENNIS OVERVIEW VIDEO SEE OUR WIMBLEDON EVENT VIDEO SEE OUR CAMPS VIDEO Magnolia Point Tennis Magnolia Point Golf and Country Club provides a full program exploding with new and exciting events. We offer 7 har-tru courts, 4 of which are lighted for night play. Magnolia Point Tennis has a fully equipped pro shop with everything you will need to start or advance your game. For your convenience we offer 24-hour turn-around racket stringing. For our members or residents, there are no additional court fees or usage fees for the courts. Tennis Events Magnolia Point is a great place to host an event, whether you want to coordinate a small play day or have a large fundraising event, our team will ensure your experience makes you a returning customer. We are equipped to handle all your tournament needs! MAKE A RESERVATION Memberships Thank you for your interest in becoming a member at Magnolia Point Golf & Country Club! Our tennis memberships encompass all types of players from the every-day to the weekend warrior, we have a plan that will match your budget. Memberships offer many benefits including breaks on merchandise and certain F&B items. There are several types of memberships available and welcome any questions you may have. For additional information about pricing, contact us at 904-269-9276 X:8. We look forward to hearing from you! Instruction Sharing our passion through teaching and support, we want to help you become the best tennis player you want to be! Members: Adult Lessons: 30 Min â€“ $35 1 Hour â€“ $70 Junior Lessons (16 & under): 30 Min â€“ $35 1 Hour â€“ $70 Non-Members: 30 Min â€“ $40 1 Hour â€“ $80 Contact the Tennis Shop at 904-269-9276 x:8 to schedule your lesson today! Adult Tennis Magnolia Point Tennis offers a complete program of adult tennis including leagues, clinics and private instruction to suit your individual needs and schedule. We also host multiple tennis â€œsocialsâ€ and tournaments throughout the year including our Annual International Series Club Championship series. Our clinics are all â€œdrop-inâ€ style, meaning that you can come when you are available and there is no reservation necessary. Beginners Clinics are offered for those who are new to the game or in need of refreshing their basic tennis skills. We host these clinics every Monday and Wednesday evening at 6 pm. To get involved, please contact the Tennis Pro Shop at (904) 269-9276 x:8 or email Andrew Blackner, Director of Tennis at Tennis@MagnoliaPointGolfClub.com Junior Program The professional staff at Magnolia Point Tennis is committed to providing programs that will allow your child to reach their full potential. Not only will the students benefit from increased self-esteem and personal growth, but they will also develop a love for the game, all while learning the value of sportsmanship in a safe and fun environment.
